info.title: German Federal Parliament (Independent Publisher)
info.description: Access German Parliament legislative data, documents, and activities.

get.description: Returns a list of all parliamentary processes in the Bundestag.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of records to return.
parameters.x-ms-summary: Limit the number of returned records.

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Cursor for pagination.
parameters.x-ms-summary: Cursor used for paginated requests.

200.description: Successful response containing a list of processes.

500.description: Internal Server Error - Unexpected error occurred.

get.description: Returns metadata for a specific parliamentary process in the Bundestag.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the parliamentary process.
parameters.x-ms-summary: Retrieve a parliamentary process by its ID.

500.description: Internal Server Error - Unexpected error occurred.

get.description: Returns a list of all positions within legislative processes in the Bundestag.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of records to return.
parameters.x-ms-summary: Limit the number of returned records.

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Cursor for pagination.
parameters.x-ms-summary: Cursor used for paginated requests.

200.description: Successful response containing a list of process positions.

500.description: Internal Server Error - Unexpected error occurred.

get.description: Returns metadata for a specific process step in the Bundestag.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the process step.
parameters.x-ms-summary: Retrieve a process step by its ID.

200.description: Successful response containing process step details.

500.description: Internal Server Error - Unexpected error occurred.

get.description: Returns a list of all parliamentary documents (Drucksachen) in the Bundestag.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of records to return.
parameters.x-ms-summary: Limit the number of returned records.

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Cursor for pagination.
parameters.x-ms-summary: Cursor used for paginated requests.

200.description: Successful response containing a list of parliamentary documents.

500.description: Internal Server Error - Unexpected error occurred.

get.description: Returns metadata for a specific parliamentary document in the Bundestag.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the parliamentary document.
parameters.x-ms-summary: Retrieve a parliamentary document by its ID.

500.description: Internal Server Error - Unexpected error occurred.

get.description: Returns a list of all parliamentary document texts (Drucksache Text) in the Bundestag.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of records to return.
parameters.x-ms-summary: Limit the number of returned records.

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Cursor for pagination.
parameters.x-ms-summary: Cursor used for paginated requests.

200.description: Successful response containing a list of document texts.

500.description: Internal Server Error - Unexpected error occurred.

get.summary: Retrieve a specific parliamentary document text
get.description: Returns metadata and content for a specific parliamentary document text (Drucksache Text) in the Bundestag.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the parliamentary document text.
parameters.x-ms-summary: Retrieve a document text by its ID.

200.description: Successful response containing document text details.

500.description: Internal Server Error - Unexpected error occurred.

get.description: Returns a list of all plenary protocols (Plenarprotokolle) in the Bundestag.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of records to return.
parameters.x-ms-summary: Limit the number of returned records.

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Cursor for pagination.
parameters.x-ms-summary: Cursor used for paginated requests.

200.description: Successful response containing a list of plenary protocols.

500.description: Internal Server Error - Unexpected error occurred.

get.description: Returns metadata for a specific plenary protocol in the Bundestag.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the plenary protocol.
parameters.x-ms-summary: Retrieve a plenary protocol by its ID.

200.description: Successful response containing plenary protocol details.

500.description: Internal Server Error - Unexpected error occurred.

get.description: Returns a list of all plenary protocol texts in the Bundestag.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of records to return.
parameters.x-ms-summary: Limit the number of returned records.

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Cursor for pagination.
parameters.x-ms-summary: Cursor used for paginated requests.

200.description: Successful response containing a list of plenary protocol texts.

500.description: Internal Server Error - Unexpected error occurred.

get.summary: Retrieve a specific plenary protocol text
get.description: Returns metadata and content for a specific plenary protocol text in the Bundestag.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the plenary protocol text.
parameters.x-ms-summary: Retrieve a plenary protocol text by its ID.

200.description: Successful response containing plenary protocol text details.

500.description: Internal Server Error - Unexpected error occurred.

get.description: Returns a list of all recorded parliamentary activities (Aktivitaeten) in the Bundestag.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of records to return.
parameters.x-ms-summary: Limit the number of returned records.

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Cursor for pagination.
parameters.x-ms-summary: Cursor used for paginated requests.

200.description: Successful response containing a list of parliamentary activities.

500.description: Internal Server Error - Unexpected error occurred.

get.description: Returns metadata for a specific parliamentary activity in the Bundestag.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the parliamentary activity.
parameters.x-ms-summary: Retrieve a parliamentary activity by its ID.

500.description: Internal Server Error - Unexpected error occurred.

get.summary: Retrieve all persons in the Bundestag
get.description: Returns a list of all persons in the Bundestag, including politicians, officials, and other relevant individuals.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of records to return.
parameters.x-ms-summary: Limit the number of returned records.

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Cursor for pagination.
parameters.x-ms-summary: Cursor used for paginated requests.

200.description: Successful response containing a list of persons.

500.description: Internal Server Error - Unexpected error occurred.

get.description: Returns metadata for a specific person in the Bundestag.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the person.
parameters.x-ms-summary: Retrieve a person by their ID.

500.description: Internal Server Error - Unexpected error occurred.

VorgangListResponse.title: Parliamentary Process List Response
VorgangListResponse.description: Response containing a list of parliamentary processes.

cursor.description: Pagination cursor for retrieving more results.

Vorgang.title: Parliamentary Process Metadata
Vorgang.description: Metadata for a specific parliamentary process.

VorgangspositionListResponse.title: Parliamentary Process Steps Response
VorgangspositionListResponse.description: Response containing a list of parliamentary process steps.

numFound.description: Total number of process steps found.

cursor.description: Pagination cursor for retrieving more results.

Vorgangsposition.title: Parliamentary Process Step
Vorgangsposition.description: Metadata for a specific parliamentary process step.

id.description: Unique identifier for the process step.

gang.description: Indicates whether the process step is crucial for legislative progress.

Fundstelle.description: Reference to a document related to the process step.

DrucksacheListResponse.title: Parliamentary Documents List Response
DrucksacheListResponse.description: Response containing a list of parliamentary documents.

cursor.description: Pagination cursor for retrieving more results.

Drucksache.title: Parliamentary Document Metadata
Drucksache.description: Metadata for a specific parliamentary document.

PlenarprotokollListResponse.title: Plenary Protocol List Response
PlenarprotokollListResponse.description: Response containing a list of plenary protocols.

cursor.description: Pagination cursor for retrieving more results.

Plenarprotokoll.title: Plenary Protocol Metadata
Plenarprotokoll.description: Metadata for a specific plenary protocol.

id.description: Unique identifier for the plenary protocol.

datum.description: Date the plenary protocol was created.

AktivitaetListResponse.title: Parliamentary Activities List Response
AktivitaetListResponse.description: Response containing a list of parliamentary activities.

cursor.description: Pagination cursor for retrieving more results.

Aktivitaet.title: Parliamentary Activity Metadata
Aktivitaet.description: Metadata for a specific parliamentary activity.

id.description: Unique identifier for the parliamentary activity.

type.description: Type of activity, e.g., debate, vote, session.

title.description: Title or brief description of the activity.

vorgangId.description: ID of the related legislative process.

Vorgangsbezug.description: Reference to a legislative process linked to the activity.

vorgangId.description: The ID of the related legislative process.

titel.description: Title of the referenced legislative process.

datum.description: Date of the referenced legislative process.

PersonListResponse.title: Bundestag Persons List Response
PersonListResponse.description: Response containing a list of persons in the Bundestag.

cursor.description: Pagination cursor for retrieving more results.

documents.description: List of persons in the Bundestag.

Person.title: Bundestag Person Metadata
Person.description: Metadata for a specific person in the Bundestag.

geburtsdatum.description: Date of birth of the person.

rolle.description: List of roles held by the person in the Bundestag.

PersonRole.title: Person Role Metadata
PersonRole.description: A role held by a person in the Bundestag.

rolle.description: Title or role held by the person.

DokumentTextBase.description: Base structure for document text entities.

id.description: Unique identifier for the document text.

text.description: The full text content of the document.

DrucksacheText.title: Parliamentary Document Text Metadata
DrucksacheText.description: Metadata for a specific document text.

id.description: Unique identifier for the document text.

datum.description: Date the document text was created.

DrucksacheTextListResponse.title: Parliamentary Document Text List Response
DrucksacheTextListResponse.description: Response containing a list of document texts.

numFound.description: Total number of document texts found.

cursor.description: Pagination cursor for retrieving more results.

id.description: Unique identifier for the document text.

text.description: The full text content of the document.

id.description: Unique identifier for the activity display.

PlenarprotokollTextListResponse.description: Response containing a list of plenary protocol texts.

numFound.description: Total number of plenary protocol texts found.

cursor.description: Pagination cursor for retrieving more results.

Inkrafttreten.description: Metadata about the enactment of legislation.

datum.description: Date when the law comes into effect.

Ressort.description: Government ministry or department responsible for an issue.

Urheber.description: Creator or author of a legislative document.

datum.description: Date when the law was proclaimed.

Vorgangspositionbezug.description: Reference to a specific step within a legislative process.

link.description: URL link to the related process.
